Description:
IN/4720078/sb1 :

You have a local exhaust ventilation system (extraction) used by your welders to remove welding fume which is a substance hazardous to health, but it has not had a thorough examination and test within the last 14 months.

IN/4720078/sb2 :

Your T400 Lathe does not have a suitable guard to prevent operators becoming entangled in the chuck.
